column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The cheese was bland
column2: there was barely any sauce (just small tomato chunks)
column3: and the crust was too buttery and crispy. Hardly edible. I was starving so I ate it and was full
column4: but I wouldn't go back. I'll stick with another Chicago pizza instead (Giordano's). Some people swear by Lou Malnati's but it just isn't what I was looking for in my pizza.
